programme.title: Earths Natural Wonders
programme.desc: The first of three programmes exploring the most inhospitable places on the planet and the people who live there, including a team of Sherpa roping a route on Mount Everests notorious Khumbu Icefall and, on the slopes of Mount Kilimanjaro, farmers fight pitched battles to save their crops from marauding elephants. In the Amazon rainforest, two boys undergo a rite of passage involving hundreds of ants with the most painful stings on Earth, and conservationists in the Grand Canyon try to ensure the survival of one of Americas few surviving condor chicks

programme.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
programme.desc: Lounge singers Lorelei and Dorothy embark on a transatlantic cruise to Paris in search of rich husbands. While Dorothy falls for a penniless man, Lorelei thinks she has found the millionaire of her dreams, only for his father to hire a private eye to spy on her and prove she is a gold-digger. Howard Hawks musical comedy, starring Marilyn Monroe, Jane Russell, Charles Coburn and Elliott Reid

programme.title: Parkinson
programme.sub-title: Harry Secombe, Harold Robbins and Anita Loos
programme.desc: Michael Parkinson is joined by actor and comedian Harry Secombe, author Harold Robbins and actress and novelist Anita Loos. First broadcast 12 October 1974

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Soldiers are separated from their comrades-in-arms during the Dunkirk evacuation and face a terrifying journey to safety. A heroic lance corporal takes charge, aiming to lead the platoon to sanctuary while those around him panic. Second World War adventure, starring John Mills, Richard Attenborough, Robert Urquhart and Bernard Lee

programme.title: Talking Pictures
programme.desc: Profile of Oscar-winning actor John Mills, featuring clips from TV appearances he made during his seven-decade career, and capturing the milestones and highlights of his fame. Narrated by Sylvia Syms

programme.title: Earths Natural Wonders
programme.desc: The first of three programmes exploring the most inhospitable places on the planet and the people who live there, including a team of Sherpa roping a route on Mount Everests notorious Khumbu Icefall and, on the slopes of Mount Kilimanjaro, farmers fight pitched battles to save their crops from marauding elephants. In the Amazon rainforest, two boys undergo a rite of passage involving hundreds of ants with the most painful stings on Earth, and conservationists in the Grand Canyon try to ensure the survival of one of Americas few surviving condor chicks

programme.title: Britains Nuclear Secrets: Inside Sellafield
programme.desc: Physicist Jim Al-Khalili explores the history of the nuclear facility near the village of Seascale in Cumbria, investigating Britains attempts - past, present and future - to harness the power of the atom. He examines the ways waste and spent fuel rods have been stored there over the past 70 years and looks at the latest attempts to try to clean some of it up, from storage in vast open-air ponds to encasing pieces of old reactors in concrete blocks

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Zoe Ball presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 29 May 1998. Featuring the Corrs, Bus Stop feat Carl Douglas, Beverley Knight, Robyn, NYCC, the Mavericks, Lutricia McNeal and the Tamperer feat Maya

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Jo Whiley presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 5 June 1998. Featuring Natalie Imbruglia, Boyzone, Super Furry Animals, Mousse T featuring Hot n Juicy, Spice Girls, Gloria Estefan, N-Tyce and B*witched

programme.title: BBC Proms 2025
programme.sub-title: Vienna Philharmonic Plays Mozart and Tchaikovsky at the Proms
programme.desc: One of the worlds great orchestras make a much-anticipated return to the Royal Albert Hall, conducted by Franz Welser-Most with two landmark symphonies that each broke the musical mould - Mozarts Prague and Tchaikovskys Pathetique. Petroc Trelawny presents

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Simon Mayo and Peter Powell introduce the edition first broadcast on September 15, featuring Bros, the Commodores, the Proclaimers, the Pasadenas, Coldcut featuring Junior Reid, Salt-n-Pepa, Jason Donovan, the Hollies, Phil Collins and Inner City

programme.title: Radio 2 in the Park
programme.sub-title: Best of Radio 2 in the Park 2025
programme.desc: A selection of highlights from the glittering performances on the Main Stage at Radio 2 in the Park 2025 in Chelmsford

programme.title: BB King - The Life of Riley
programme.desc: The American blues singer-songwriter recounts his story of a rise to prominence in the music industry, earning him the title King of the Blues. Born into a world of oppression in the cotton plantations outside Berclair, Mississippi, he went on to assemble his own band under the guidance of Millard Lee and found widespread popularity with his Singin the Blues album in the Elvis-charged swinging zeitgeist of 1956. His talent showed no bounds, and more than half a century later he released his 42nd studio album, One Kind Favor, by which time he was well into his eighties - and showing no sign of giving up. Filmed in locations across the States, as well as the United Kingdom, and featuring contributions by a range of fellow musicians including Eric Clapton, Bono, George Benson and Mick Hucknall. Narrated by Morgan Freeman

programme.title: BB King at Glastonbury
programme.desc: The famed Mississippi blues musician and electric guitarist, whose career has spanned eight decades, performs on the Pyramid Stage on the opening day of the festival. Introduced by Mark Radcliffe

programme.title: Robson Greens Weekend Escapes
programme.desc: Emmerdale actress Laura Norton joins Robson for a break in the Yorkshire Dales, where they cycle through Swaledale on electric bikes. The ruins of Jervaulx Abbey are the setting for their overnight stay and theres a lesson in kite making and flying. The outdoor mini break is set to paper as Robson and Laura explore the benefits of a guided walk to create their very own poetry at Thorp Perrow

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Ginny Buckley explores the Wye Valley with a couple whose move is fuelled by a desire to be closer to their grandchildren. Along the way, Ginny visits a family-run fermented foods business, where she gets to make her very own kimchi

After a tough few years, Michael and wife Jan would love a holiday - but how much will the funds made at auction contribute towards getting them onto a cruise ship?

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott discovers the dark side of Thailands backpacker culture. In the first episode, she lands in trouble with the Thai police when she starts to uncover the scale of Thailands illegal sex industry. A visit to the Bangkok Immigration Detention Centre exposes how easy it is to get caught on the wrong side of the law

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott meets men chasing cheap thrills in Asias sex capital, Pattaya, and also talks to a local sex worker, who reveals the harsh reality of working in the illegal sex industry. She then heads to Ko Phangan, an exotic island famed for its spirituality and beauty. For Zara, this is paradise - but Lucio, a Brit who built a burgeoning cannabis business here while the drug was decriminalised, reveals that navigating the local law isnt always easy

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott experiences Ko Phangans famous Full Moon Party, but beneath the cheap cocktails, music and fire shows, theres danger lurking as the medical team treat a possible drink-spiking victim. She then travels to Phuket and experiences a taste of Thailands luxury lifestyle. But she also learns how dream holidays can quickly go wrong, hearing the case of a British holiday-maker who died on the island - and whose family is still searching for answers

programme.desc: Briony May Williams teams up with a retired Shakespeare scholar who wants to write a new chapter in the Cumbrian countryside for her £300,000 budget. Away from the house hunting, Briony visits a young couple who made their own country escape and now have a farm with over 100 acres in a tiny Cumbrian village, where they herd sheep with their beloved sheepdogs

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: Auctioneer James Broad and restorer JJ Chalmers head to Oxford to clear a house of rare inherited collections and sentimental items. JB stumbles upon a rare and valuable book collection and JJ restores a treasured washstand. However, one wrong blow with a hammer could damage a cherished piece beyond repair

programme.title: Paula McIntyres Hamely Kitchen
programme.desc: Paulas next leg of her American food adventure sees her taking on a big breakfast challenge. She visits Americas oldest cast-iron forge to see how skillets are made, takes an unforgettable cable car ride above the mountains in Gatlinburg and tries her first taste of moonshine at a Smoky Mountain distillery. At her cabin kitchen, Paula makes a popcorn topped pudding and Hush Puppies with a savoury relish

programme.title: Our Lives
programme.desc: Documentary following four families as they compete in a prestigious haggis contest. All hail from small butcher shops and each has ambitions of winning the World Haggis Championship, staged at the Dewar Centre in Perth. Behind the fun, the bravado, the regional one-upmanship, the toon v teuchter banter, the heirloom recipes and the secret spices, this film also reveals a wider story - one of Scottish pride in its food supply chain, the importance of the community shop and the role that such dishes can play in protecting and celebrating a nations common history

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Knockout week comes to a head as the 10 remaining amateurs undergo the invention test, in which they have just 60 minutes to deliver an extraordinary dish. The larder is at their disposal with a plentiful supply of fresh fish, meats, vegetables, herbs and spices. Success could mean a place in the semi-finals but it will is sure to be their toughest challenge yet

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: A crate containing the couples mobile phones washes ashore, revealing more than anyone bargained for. David drops a bombshell to Ini, causing shockwaves at the Couples Cove. And when night falls, a movie serves up some even bigger surprises for the honeymooners. Presented by Davina McCall

Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Ethan Hawke, Scott Glenn and Tom Berenger

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: The Saxon gods form an unlikely team of superheroes, famous astronaut Neil Armstrong reveals his new weight loss programme, Georgian Londons crime-fighting genius is revealed, and Rosa Parks sings about her struggle for equality

programme.title: The Catch Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May are challenged to create a TV advert for Volkswagen, but soon fall out as James concentrates on detailed information on fuel economy and Jeremy wants something more exciting. Richard Hammond explores an alternative to Germanic sports saloons and tests the Vauxhall VXR8 Bathurst, and former US chat show host Jay Leno is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Bad Nanny
programme.desc: The first of a two-part documentary telling the story of Samantha Cookes - serial fraudster, master manipulator and, at one point, a trusted nanny. The film reveals one of her most brazen personas - Carrie Jade Williams, a supposedly terminally ill, award-winning author - which she used to scam her way across the UK and Ireland. She also invented the character of a nanny with a troubling secret, as well as several other audacious cons through the years

programme.title: Bad Nanny
programme.desc: The concluding part of the documentary reveals how fraudster Samantha Cookes deception reached new heights as she entered the lives of Lorraine, Lynn and Hillery, posing as a therapist for children with additional needs. Under the alias Lucy Fitzwilliams, she earned their trust seeking donations for a womens refuge. She then reinvented herself once more as a terminally ill author in Co Kerry, asking for money for surgery in LA. But when some of her victims discovered the truth thanks to a TikTok video, the vulnerable families banded together and turned detective to expose the truth, ultimately leading to Samanthas dramatic downfall and conviction in 2025

programme.title: Sound of Metal
programme.desc: Rock drummer Ruben Stone begins to lose his hearing and begrudgingly enrols in a residential programme for deaf recovering addicts run by a Vietnam War veteran. Oscar and Bafta-winning drama, starring Riz Ahmed, Olivia Cooke and Paul Raci

programme.desc: Salon junior Molly steps up her skills with the aim of getting a pay rise while Jade has a bloody shocker with a piercing. Meanwhile, Kallie is nervous as boyfriend Ewan finally has the brain scan that will decide his fate

programme.title: Angels of the North

programme.desc: Zara McDermott experiences Ko Phangans famous Full Moon Party, but beneath the cheap cocktails, music and fire shows, theres danger lurking as the medical team treat a possible drink-spiking victim. She then travels to Phuket and experiences a taste of Thailands luxury lifestyle. But she also learns how dream holidays can quickly go wrong, hearing the case of a British holiday-maker who died on the island - and whose family is still searching for answers

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Featuring a charming Stuart highwayman, the captain of the Titanic, famous writer Mary Shelley and a group of violent Vikings, whose members show their softer side through song

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Charles Dickens sings about his life and books, and Vlad the Impaler reveals his horrible new plan for keeping out the neighbours

programme.title: The Catch Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May test-drive an Aston Martin DBS Convertible, a Ferrari California and a Lamborghini Gallardo Convertible through Romania, searching for the mountain highway built during the reign of the countrys former dictator Nicolae Ceausescu - allegedly the best road to drive on in the world. Actor Eric Bana is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Easy A
programme.desc: Misfit teenager Olive lies about her non-existent sexual history, and soon becomes the talk of the school. While she endures the harassment of conservative classmates, she grows to love the attention and sets out to create yet more rumours - but is unprepared when things get out of hand. Teen comedy, starring Emma Stone, Penn Badgley and Amanda Bynes

programme.title: Bump
programme.desc: Madison and Oly attend a protest rampage, dragging a nervous Michael along for the ride. Olys hangover leads to a big parenting fail, while a confusing encounter between Jacinda and Santis new girlfriend distracts her away from Reemas return from London. Keeks accidently sees Santi with Jacinda as she gets her coffee, so she assumes an identity that creates some confusion. Australian drama, starring Nathalie Morris, Ava Cannon and Carlos Sanson Jr

programme.title: Bump
programme.desc: Things have never been worse between Santi and Oly, who arent talking to each other. At Pica del Sabor, Bernarditas friendliness with a customer leads to a noisy showdown. Oly is alarmed when Jacinda starts spouting Bible quotes and having nightmares about burning in Hell, and angrily assumes Bernardita is to blame. When Oly learns Santi secretly enrolled Jacinda in Catholic Scripture at school, shes furious and overlooks the inconvenient fact that it was Angie who told Jacinda about Hell. Australian drama, starring Carlos Sanson Jr, Ava Cannon and Nathalie Morris

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott discovers the dark side of Thailands backpacker culture. In the first episode, she lands in trouble with the Thai police when she starts to uncover the scale of Thailands illegal sex industry. A visit to the Bangkok Immigration Detention Centre exposes how easy it is to get caught on the wrong side of the law

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott meets men chasing cheap thrills in Asias sex capital, Pattaya, and also talks to a local sex worker, who reveals the harsh reality of working in the illegal sex industry. She then heads to Ko Phangan, an exotic island famed for its spirituality and beauty. For Zara, this is paradise - but Lucio, a Brit who built a burgeoning cannabis business here while the drug was decriminalised, reveals that navigating the local law isnt always easy

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: The Hero Trap/Bird Call/Let It Bee/The Staff Of Wisdom/The Snake Dance/Grasshopper Chep
programme.desc: The Mushlets love Mush-Mush’s heroic stories. But when they demand to see him actually do something heroic, Mush-Mush feels he can’t back out. / Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. / Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers – a job that takes time and care. / Mush-Mush is amazed by the way Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom and how awesome it makes him look. / When Mush-Mush and Chep lose Lilit’s flying disc down a snake tunnel, he is confident he can get it back. / All the Mushables have fun zooming down a long mudslide except Chep, who just cant get up the courage to do it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: ...Bear/Lemming Interference/High Voltage Bear Attack/Bear Scents/Bear Luck/Magnetic Bear => Grizzy discovers that the frenzied break dance the Lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. / Grizzy is thirsty but the river bed has dried up. / The Lemmings have caught a little spider. Her sticky, elastic threads are absolutely perfect for bungee jumping. / Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. / Grizzys TV dinner is interrupted by unexplained static. / The Lemmings are having a rave party. When Grizzy throws their ghetto blaster into the river, he sparks a general power outage. / Grizzy wants to offer his beloved she-bear some flowers. / This is not Grizzys day… But his luck is about to change. / Grizzy can’t believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves. He soon realises it’s the Lemmings who are playing around with a magnet.

programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome little ones Alfie, Charlie, Ollie, River, Araiya and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. Parents, carers and their babies at home are invited to join in with all the fun activities too! Inside Giovannas bag are numbered building blocks, and all the parents and little ones have different objects and toys that are themed around numbers. These are explored through discovery, play, song and story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding safe, baby-appropriate number-themed objects and toys inside a fabric bag or pillowcase for them to reveal and explore with their baby! The traditional childrens nursery rhyme One, Two, Buckle My Shoe features, as does a story involving Baby Bear, and viewers at home show how theyve been exploring numbers too. The Action Song gets everyone moving about, before some calm time with sensory bubbles and the Goodbye Song.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Nigel and Baby Bear welcome babies Sullivan, Araiya, River, Taiba, Luna and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. Parents, carers and their little ones at home are invited to join in with all the fun activities too! Nigel has got a shopping basket inside his bag. All the parents and babies have different objects and toys that are themed around a trip to the shops too, which are explored through play, songs and a story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to hide a baby-appropriate shopping-themed toy or object inside a fabric bag or pillowcase, to discover with their baby! Some viewers at home show how theyve been exploring shopping too. The fun childrens song Shopping Day features, as does a story about Baby Bear at the shops. The Baby Bear Song gets everyone moving about, before some calm time with sensory lights and the Goodbye Song.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug borrows a baby from Danny in an attempt to convince Carrie they are ready to start a family. Meanwhile, Arthur thinks he deserves to be the coffee shops customer of the month. Starring Leah Remini, Kevin James and Jerry Stiller

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: When Doug gets beaten by his mother in a poker game, he tries to persuade her to enter a high-stakes tournament. Meanwhile, Carrie asks for Spences help in losing her accent because she thinks it will improve her chances of getting a promotion. American comedy, starring Kevin James

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra takes Ally and the twins to her parents house, leaving Ray at home by himself - and he finds it impossible to get to sleep. American comedy, starring Ray Romano, Patricia Heaton and Peter Boyle

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: A desperate Ray does everything he can to get to the front of the queue to meet the New York Mets 1969 team at the National Baseball Hall of Fame. Comedy, starring Ray Romano

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray tells Debra she takes up too much room in bed - but he comes to regret complaining when she banishes him to the couch. Comedy, starring Ray Romano and Patricia Heaton

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The shrink casually wanders into Daphnes bedroom, making her furious with him. He apologises, but inadvertently does it again and she threatens to leave, forcing him to shower her with gifts to make her stay. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Crane brothers are both invited to join a prestigious gentlemens club - but unfortunately there is only a single vacancy available, meaning one of them is destined for disappointment. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The shrink worries he is being stalked by an unbalanced fan after receiving strange gifts with seemingly threatening messages attached. In an effort to thwart any assassination attempt he hires a female bodyguard to protect him at an awards ceremony. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Worried that Martin has never expressed his love for them, Frasier and Niles join their father on a fishing trip in the hope that they can bond with him. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, David Hyde Pierce and John Mahoney

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to New Orleans, Louisiana to help the owner of Blakes Place, a small Creole-Italian restaurant that has lost sight of the most crucial aspect of an eaterys reputation - executing delicious and memorable dishes. The restaurant has spiralled into chaos, and owner Blake Cressey hasnt taken a salary in six months. Blake is starstruck to meet Gordon, but will she take his advice and rediscover what really matters in running a successful business?

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Channel 4s midday news summary

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A very important guest visits Paul and Fionas villa in France, while couple Summer and Ashley take on even more work in Italy. In Portugal, Louise and Shay look for a new start

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Master mechanic Fuzz Townshend and parts-blagging petrolhead Tim Shaw head to Co Durham to secretly fix-up an Austin Healey for John, who has Parkinsons disease - and set out to make his classic car dreams come true

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host the long-running words-and-numbers game, with comedian Chris McCausland joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sarah and Andy from Derbyshire have been together for nine years and are planning a permanent move to Spains southern Costa Blanca. They want a property with enough room for them and their combined six children and four grandchildren to come and stay. Leah Charles-King lines up five properties for their maximum budget of £160,000

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: Mike takes living conditions back to basics at a 200-year-old mountain village in Spain, while in France Paul and Yip balance the demands of multiple unstable structures in their hamlet. Over in Sicily, George aims to expand his one-euro property empire

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Living in a chateau is a constant battle with maintenance, and for Erin and JB its no exception as they try to combat a leaky roof. Erin also has a creative art project to enhance their Yellow Salon for an anniversary dinner party. In Cognac Country, Sarah and George take on the challenge to makeover an entire estate cottage on a tiny budget, wanting to create a family bolthole for the busy wedding season

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In Málaga, previous client Neal returns to ask the Hamiltons for their help again. This time, the sports fanatic wants a beachfront property where he can simply walk out of his door and onto his paddleboard, all for a budget of 300,000 euros. With front-line Málaga properties at a premium, the Hamiltons have their work cut out. In Almería, mother-and-son team Sharon and Shaun Garner are poised to help Sue and Don find their dream holiday home for their budget of 140,000 euros. The couple want to get as much bang for their buck as possible in their preferred location of Los Gallardos

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: Eighty-eight-year-old identical twins Nancy and Beryl are looking for a four-legged friend to join them for pub lunches. Pint-size pooch Alfie may well fit the bill. Meanwhile, a fox-red Labrador called Bear tries to impress would-be owners Chris and Donna without putting his paw in it

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Greg Davies and Alex Horne welcome the latest five comics to take on the challenge - Maisie Adam, Reece Shearsmith, Sanjeev Bhaskar, Phil Ellis and Ania Magliano. Theyll be facing all manner of tasks, beginning with challenges involving codes, gym balls and disgusting noises, to test their daring, dexterity and dignity under pressure - and to also make them look just a little bit silly too

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: A compilation of memorable moments from recent episodes, featuring hosts Jimmy Carr, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent. Guest players include Jon Richardson, Jonathan Ross, Alan Carr, Rosie Jones, Jack Dee, Roisin Conaty, Sarah Millican, Tom Allen, Richard Ayoade, Joe Wilkinson (and his half-brother Fabio), Lee Mack, Rose Matafeo, Maisie Adam and Judi Love

programme.title: Big Fat Quiz: Best Bits
programme.desc: Choice moments from the show posing questions on art, literature, television, music, geography, politics, science and celebrity from the last 100,000 years. This episode focuses on the dreamiest team pairings, as host Jimmy Carr is joined by James Corden, Sarah Millican, Rose Matafeo, Michael McIntyre, Jack Whitehall, Richard Ayoade, Miranda Hart, Judi Love, Katherine Ryan, Sean Lock, Chelsea Peretti, Jonathan Ross, James Acaster and many more

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Acerbic chef Gordon Ramsay steps in to save a small cafe and a couples engagement. Christopher Keff and his fiancee Tess Robinson inherited New York diner Love Bites Cafe, but working together has created a toxic work environment and has soured their relationship to the point that Gordon recommends therapy

programme.title: The Inheritance
programme.desc: The players must fulfil the final orders from The Deceaseds farm shop and prepare an order for luxury VIP hampers, complete with homemade sausages and freshly churned butter. In a high-stakes Division Ceremony, alliances begin to fracture as trust gives way to betrayal, and one players sense of fairness is driven to breaking point

programme.title: The Inheritance
programme.desc: At the Deceaseds grand glampsite, the players must prepare the grounds for her famed Estate Festival - but a crucial instruction is misplaced. Tonights Prime Beneficiary faces a decision that has the power to shift the entire balance of the game. But whatever they choose, will anyone truly believe their word?

programme.title: The Inheritance
programme.desc: The players must find and restore some of the Deceaseds prized possessions, but will they manage to return them to their former glory, or do they look more like DIY disasters? With another cut looming, every decision grows heavier and every misstep more dangerous, while the prime beneficiary is given more power than ever before

In Kensington and Chelsea, Marion and Fraser are seeking a one-bedroom flat on a budget of £475,000

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra gets a job, filling Ray with dread at the thought of having to take responsibility for all the household chores while she is at work

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra and Ray are taken aback to realise they are much nicer to strangers than to each other, and decide to show a little more mutual consideration in future - but their resolve soon crumbles. American comedy, guest starring Kevin James as Doug Heffernan, his character in The King of Queens

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A caller to his radio show gives Frasier the impression Niless wife Maris might be having an affair with her fencing instructor. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Bebe advises Frasier to feign illness to secure a pay rise and prove he is indispensable, but the station responds by cleaning out his cubicle and auditioning for a replacement. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and Harriet Sansom Harris

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Crane brothers buy into a restaurant, but their conflicting views on everything leave them without a head chef on opening night - and most of the waiters also walk out. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Martin prepares to celebrate his birthday, but an argument between Niles and Frasier over a patient, as well as a city-wide power cut, ensures none of the household is in the mood for a party. Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce star

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay applies his gastronomic and business acumen to Simmer Down Cafe in Georgetown, Texas, whose owner Chris Marino wishes to attract a younger, richer clientele. Chris has asked his brother Albert to come out of retirement to help with the business, but struggles with the notion that things can function properly without his presence

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Channel 4s midday news summary

programme.desc: After a long renovation, novice hosts Tom and Terry have a trial run for their vegan BandB in Spain, while test guests are also expected at Summer and Ashleys place in Italy. A busy summer season comes to a close for Paul and Fionas villa in France while, in Portugal, dreamers Louise and Shay find out if they can make it all a reality

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend travel to Benfleet in Essex to pick up a real 1970s supercar - a Lotus Esprit S1 - a car made famous when it transformed into a submarine in the James Bond movie The Spy Who Loved Me. When the boys arrive to collect it they discover that, rather than being one of the most eye-catching British sports cars ever constructed, they have a really tatty car that hasnt been started for 20 years

programme.title: Countdown

programme.desc: In France, a new purchase takes Paul and Yip to a momentous milestone. Mikes restoration of his Spanish mountain village grinds to a halt. George tackles major structural issues in Sicily

programme.desc: Storms and bad weather have spelt disaster for Erin and JB, as part of the original mediaeval foundations of their island have collapsed into the moat. Stephanies tartan apartment project for Gerry continues as she rolls up her sleeves to sand blast the hayloft beams. Sarah and George agree to host the local town fete, but with a septic tank being installed just days before the event the grounds are far from picture perfect

Estate agent Kerry is challenged with fulfilling their long wish list, but things become more difficult when a potential property surprises the seasoned agent

programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Gogglebox

programme.title: Mitchell and Webb Are Not Helping

Comedy sequel, starring Jason Biggs, Chris Klein, Seann William Scott, Alyson Hannigan and Eugene Levy

programme.desc: Sheldon uses his holidays to help Amy in her biology lab, but moans about the menial jobs he is given - until she asks him to dissect a brain. Penny grows curious about Leonards attitude to marriage when Bernadette asks Howard to sign a pre-nuptial agreement

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Raj and Howard devise a contest to decide whether Sheldon or Kripke should get Professor Rothmans vacant corner office. Meanwhile, Penny receives the gift of a painting from Amy to celebrate their friendship, but discreetly tries to dispose of it with help from Bernadette

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon refuses to get his hair cut as his regular barber is in a coma - a solitary change that causes chaos in the rest of his well-ordered life. Meanwhile, Howard undergoes a gruelling Nasa training programme in Houston, Texas, meaning he can only communicate with Bernadette via the internet

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: After identifying the mob informant, Holt, Jake and Rosa make plans to infiltrate FBI headquarters to get the mans files, with the captain bringing in his former partner to help out. Guest starring Dennis Haysbert (24s President Palmer)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Officers at the precinct drop everything to intervene when they suspect that Captain Holt is in danger after their efforts to track down Adrian Pimentos hitman take an unexpected turn. Dennis Haysbert guest stars

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge bumps her head while cleaning the kitchen and loses any recollection of Homer - who is forced to woo her all over again in a bid to re-establish their relationship and restore domestic bliss to the Simpson household

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Homer and Marge Turn a Couple Play
programme.desc: Homer and Marge dispense marital advice to a player on the Isotopes baseball team whose career is flagging due to his sexy wife singing at each game. The Simpsons soon find their own marriage on the rocks, and struggle to save their relationship while helping the couple. With the voice of Mandy Moore

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard tries to get Sheldon into the Christmas mood by playing a game, but things do not go as planned when Sheldon reveals a childhood trauma. Raj goes out with the girls and reveals he had crushes on both Penny and Bernadette - but not Amy. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is not pleased when his assistant Alex starts flirting with Leonard and has a word with her about it. Unfortunately, his comments are so inappropriate that he is accused of sexual harassment and sent to the universitys human resources department, where he ends up dragging Leonard, Raj and Howard into trouble too. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys become stranded in the middle of nowhere when Leonards car is stolen en route to the Bakersfield comic-book convention. Meanwhile, back at home, the women try to work out why the guys are so fascinated with such publications

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is furious when the university forces him to work with Kripke, while Howards hobby lands him in financial trouble. However, that doesnt stop him and Raj getting expensive action figures of themselves made - much to Bernadettes disapproval

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Guess Whos Coming to Criticise Dinner
programme.desc: Homer becomes the Springfield Shoppers new food critic, but soon makes himself unpopular with local restaurateurs, who plot to kill him with a poisonous eclair. Featuring the guest voice of Ed Asner (Up)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homers computing error plunges Earth into chaos as an electronic apocalypse threatens Springfield, and Bart and Lisa save Xena the Warrior Princess from a super-villain. Meanwhile, the Simpsons attempt to cover up their accidental murder of Ned Flanders, but he refuses to stay dead. With the guest voices of Lucy Lawless, Tom Arnold and Dick Clark

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa takes a trip to the mall to buy a new gadget, while Bart manages to cause chaos. After making a hasty retreat, he befriends a boy named Bashir - but Homer begins to believe that his sons new pal is involved in a terrorist plot

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: An irreverent take on the Prince and the Pauper. Bart enthusiastically trades lives with wealthy lookalike Simon Woosterfield after landing himself in trouble. Simon settles into life at home with the Simpsons, but Bart finds the lavish lifestyle too much to handle when he becomes the target of all his new friends pranks

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: A Disney fan seeks a fresh start after losing her last partner due to a tragic accident, while 27-year-old Craig wants to find a man who will share his love of dogs. A retired Butlins redcoat has high hopes for her date, and a woman who has not enjoyed much luck on the dating scene may have finally found the man she is looking for

programme.title: Celebs Go Dating
programme.desc: Its time for the end of agency gala, but will Louis and Donna arrive with a plus one or stay single? Liv admits that she and Louis have still been texting and Paul wants her to end things once and for all. Christine McGuinness and other surprise guests give Louis, Sam and Mark a dressing down, and theres a surprise performance from S Clubs Jon and Atomic Kittens Kerry

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share insightful, passionate and sometimes emotional critiques of programmes including The Crown, We Are the Champions, Strictly Come Dancing, The Undoing, The Great British Bake Off, The Toe Bro and news reports on the Covid vaccine and possible restrictions on family gatherings at Christmas. From November 2020

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: The restaurant heats up as fire performer Hayley goes on a date with business owner Glen who claims if he were a movie character it would be Christian Grey. Heavily tattooed Sarah, 36-years-old from Wales, is looking for a man to take her bins out on a Tuesday and hopes to find that quality in the equally inked Dan. Twenty-four year-old William is matched with with 23-year-old Zara, both parties are on their first date ever. The final couple into the restaurant are 34-year-old Ashauna and 38-year-old Kurt who lends a sympathetic ear when Ashauna discusses her self-esteem taking a hit after facing dating discrimination over her albinism

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Dating show hosted by Anna Richardson in which two singletons choose a date from a selection of six naked people, who are revealed to them one body part at a time. This time, 22-year-old transgender woman Amira, and Andy, a rugby player from Coventry, take part

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Secret War of Lisa Simpson
programme.desc: Homer and Marge force Bart to enrol in a military academy and Lisa unwisely follows him. Once in her own barracks she is snubbed by the other cadets - but receives unexpected help from Bart to tackle the assault course. Featuring the guest voice of Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Rick and Morty
programme.desc: The duo find themselves on a space train that is one big narrative device, filled with weird passengers telling increasingly ridiculous anthology stories

programme.title: Mike Tyson Mysteries
programme.desc: The team try to bring some holiday cheer to someone whos given up on life

programme.title: Mike Tyson Mysteries
programme.desc: A grieving father attempts to help his beautiful boy

programme.title: Celebs Go Dating
programme.desc: Its time for the end of agency gala, but will Louis and Donna arrive with a plus one or stay single? Liv admits that she and Louis have still been texting and Paul wants her to end things once and for all. Christine McGuinness and other surprise guests give Louis, Sam and Mark a dressing down, and theres a surprise performance from S Clubs Jon and Atomic Kittens Kerry

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: Contracts, Rules and a Little Bit of Pig Brains
programme.desc: George Sr and Georgie go camping with Meemaws new boyfriend Dale, but things get complicated when her ex-boyfriend Dr Sturgis tags along. Sheldon and Missy invent a new game

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: A Slump, a Cross and Roadside Gravel
programme.desc: Georgie and Sheldon go mining for platinum in roadside gravel. Mary is concerned when Missy misuses religion to help improve her baseball playing

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: With their prom just around the corner, Luke and Manny find themselves with big decisions to make about who to ask, but their situation is made all the more nerve-wrecking when Cam and Mitch decide to interfere. Meanwhile, Phil and Gloria confront a competitor about stealing a hot sauce recipe and Claire grows concerned that she has a mole in her company

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay is jealous streak when a lifesize advert featuring Gloria starts attracting unsavoury attention from other men, so he and Manny hatch a plan to steal it. Meanwhile, Cam and Mitch turn on the charm as they try to garner better reviews for their rental property, but they cant help but spy when their new tenants start acting strangely

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.sub-title: I Dont Know How She Does It
programme.desc: Claire manages to easily balance running Jays closet business with her domestic tasks, but she might be exploiting a secret weapon. Meanwhile, Mitch and Cam are snubbed at their friends wedding, leaving them to wonder what they might have done to deserve such rude treatment. Comedy, guest starring Nathan Lane

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: A small lie spirals out of control for Phil when he tries to hide the fact he has an attractive new client from Claire, who is keeps her handsome yoga teacher. Elsewhere, Jay becomes obsessed with tracking down a troll whos been leaving nasty comments about his web show, and Mitch and Cam try to teach a nervous Lily to ride a bicycle

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos on the themes of food and animals

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef travels to Flamangos restaurant in Whitehouse, New Jersey, where he tries to help the mother-and-daughter owners turn around their struggling businesss fortunes. He faces a struggle because parent Adelle has a bad relationship with her staff and is disappointed by the resident chef, leaving Gordon with the added challenge of changing her attitude

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Were on the Road to Dohwhere
programme.desc: Homer is forced to drive Bart to a discipline camp in another state, meaning he has to miss out on a trip to Las Vegas with Moe and the gang. While they are away, Marge decides to hold a yard sale - but ends up getting arrested as a suspected drug dealer

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Groundskeeper Willie is made homeless and forced to move in with the family, giving Lisa the idea of trying to transform him into a gentleman. Meanwhile, Homer embarks on a campaign to save the company that manufactures his favourite blue trousers

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: A Boyfriends Ex-Wife and a Good Luck Head Rub
programme.desc: Meemaw meets Dales ex-wife June, while Sheldon is forced to work on a group project with reluctant college students. Iain Armitage stars

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Sheldon visits the California Institute of Technology for the very first time. Georgie is furious when Mary listens in on a phone call with his girlfriend, while Meemaw tries to cheer up a jealous Missy

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard asks Penny out on a date, and they agree to give their relationship another chance. They soon remember why it did not work out in the first place, but end up sleeping together anyway. The 100th episode of the comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny continue testing their rekindled relationship using an innovative system to report discrepancies. Howard and Bernadette begin to worry when Raj starts treating his new phone like a person, while Sheldon and Amy try to achieve internet fame by creating a video podcast about flags

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire determines to give Phil the perfect anniversary present and lose her reputation for offering bad gifts, so she hires one of their favourite musicians for a private performance. Mitchell and Cams party girl friend Sal comes to visit. Guest starring Edward Norton and Elizabeth Banks

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Dunphys try to throw Luke the birthday party of his dreams, but Camerons ill-fated efforts as Fizbo the clown result in a trip to AandE. American comedy, starring Ed ONeill and Julie Bowen

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy is disappointed with Sheldon when he announces he is breaking his promise to go with her to a birthday party in favour of joining the boys for a Star Wars video-game marathon. Comedy, starring Mayim Bialik and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny buys Leonard and Sheldon some Star Trek action figures, but the duo refuse to remove them from the packaging in case their value is diminished. Elsewhere, Raj is desperate to find someone to accompany him to a wedding and asks his parents to find him a date. Featuring the guest voice of Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard is put in charge of looking after Stephen Hawkings wheelchair when the famous scientist comes to lecture at the university for a week - and takes advantage of his position to blackmail Sheldon into performing assorted unpleasant tasks. Guest starring Stephen Hawking

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Raj organise a stag party for Howard, but stories about his sexual history are unwittingly revealed, and he has to persuade bride-to-be Bernadette not to call off the wedding. Comedy, starring Simon Helberg and Kunal Nayyar

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Part one of three. Peralta and Holt must adjust to their new lives in the Witness Protection Programme while crime boss Jimmy The Butcher Figgis is still at large, but their anonymity could be compromised if a video of them goes viral. Rhea Perlman and Maya Rudolph guest star

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Part two of three. When crime boss Jimmy The Butcher Figgis sees Peralta and Holts viral video and comes looking for them, the duo begin their fight back, but things go awry and they end up on the wrong side of the interrogation table. Back at the precinct, a new captain takes over, but is he up to the job? Maya Rudolph and Ken Marino guest star

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer becomes a bounty hunter to earn extra money and hires an unlikely assistant in the form of Ned Flanders - who ends up pursuing him on a charge of skipping bail over a trivial offence. Meanwhile, Marge takes a job at an unusual bakery

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart finds himself in trouble when he steals a mobile phone from Denis Leary and subsequently uses it to land the actor a comical film role. The trouble-maker then leads his family to the ancient ruins of Machu Picchu after Marge confiscates the device and decides to use its GPS technology to track her son

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: An argument between Leonard and Sheldon over the ending of a Harry Potter book affects Amy and Pennys living arrangements. Meanwhile, Howard goes on a trip to Las Vegas with Bernadette and asks Raj to keep an eye on his mother while he is away

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny celebrate Valentines Day, but their evening takes a turn for the worse when the latters ex-boyfriend proposes to his girlfriend in the same restaurant. Meanwhile, Sheldon enlists the help of his assistant Alex to find the perfect gift for Amy

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj is upset after Lucy runs away in the middle of their date, leaving the gang to cheer him up. However, when Howard bumps into her, she admits she is incredibly shy. Meanwhile, Sheldon asks Penny to help with a new episode of Fun with Flags, and because he is impressed by her acting ability, the friends go to see her in a performance of A Streetcar Named Desire

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: While the girls go to Disneyland and get made up as princesses, the guys have to promote science as a career option for women at Howards old middle school. Meanwhile, Raj and Lucy have their first date in a library, where instead of speaking to each other they send text messages

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family relocates to an abandoned farm, where Homer discovers he has a talent for growing tomatoes - which prove highly addictive and soon attract the attention of unscrupulous rival businesses. Featuring the guest voices of the B-52s

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer bowls a perfect 300 game and becomes a local hero, giving speeches to classes of schoolchildren and appearing on TV show Springfield Squares - but it is not long before fame goes to his head. With the voices of Penn and Teller and Ron Howard

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr Burns wins a professional basketball team in a poker game at the annual billionaires retreat. He decides to build a state-of-the-art stadium in an effort to lure fans, but the proposed site is on the last remaining bee colony in Springfield - prompting Lisa to lead a protest

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer becomes a bounty hunter to earn extra money and hires an unlikely assistant in the form of Ned Flanders - who ends up pursuing him on a charge of skipping bail over a trivial offence. Meanwhile, Marge takes a job at an unusual bakery

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Veteran actress Carol Cleveland, a former star of Monty Python, meets interior designer Keith. Could he be the leading man shes been waiting for all these years? Twenty-six-year-old Charles has never had a girlfriend and is yet to experience his first kiss. Could 22-year-old Freya be the one to change that? With a shared passion for origami, it isnt long before Charles impresses Freya with his talents

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: Isabel Aretas, the widow of crime lord Benito, escapes from a Mexican prison with the help of her son, Armando. She sends him to Miami to recover the stash of money his father had hidden, as well as assassinating those responsible for his dads arrest and eventual death in prison. She demands that Armando kill Miami detective Mike Lowrey last. Action sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Paola Nunez and Vanessa Hudgens

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson hosts the show in which potential dates bare all bit by bit in a bid to prove they are the one. First up is 30-year-old woman Emmy-Lou from Brighton, who has appeared on the show twice before, both times in the pod. Now she is back as the picker, unaware she is in for a big surprise. She is followed by 20-year-old Charlie from Oxford, a forensics student who hopes to find his ideal partner in crime

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson hosts the show in which potential dates bare all bit by bit in a bid to prove they are the one. First up is 27-year-old flight attendant Alex from Bristol. Having never had a serious relationship, he is hoping to land himself a man for the long haul. He is followed by 26-year-old Laura from Gloucestershire, a horse-loving country girl who is looking for love

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The locked-down armchair critics share their opinions on shows including Jamie Olivers Keep Cooking and Carry On, Celebrity Murder Mystery, Joe Wicks on The Andrew Marr Show, The Nest, This Morning with dog yoga, The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer; Gordon, Gino and Fred: American Road Trip and news coverage of the coronavirus. From April 2020

programme.title: 13 Rue Madeleine
programme.desc: Veteran officer Robert Sharkey is recruited to train a team of intelligence service agents. When one of them turns out to be a German mole, Sharkey feeds him misinformation to take back to the Gestapo. However, the rogue spy outsmarts his peers and murders an agent. Without time to recruit a replacement, Sharkey steps in to head a dangerous mission in the heart of Nazi-occupied France. Second World War thriller, with James Cagney, Richard Conte, Walter Abel, Frank Latimore and Annabella

programme.title: Django Unchained Interview Special
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino and the cast of his new Western discuss making the film

programme.title: Patton
programme.desc: Oscar-winning Second World War biopic of the American general admired for his brilliant tactical skills and ability to inspire his men to great things. But this complex man was equally noted for his abrasive temper, egotism and consuming sense of rivalry, which so antagonised his superiors he was eventually relieved of his command. Starring George C Scott, Karl Malden, Michael Bates and Stephen Young

programme.title: Dead of Night
programme.desc: A group of people gather at a country house where their supernatural stories become all too real for one of the guests, who realises theyre all part of his recurring nightmare. Horror anthology, starring Mervyn Johns, Michael Redgrave and Googie Withers

programme.title: Django Unchained Interview Special
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino and the cast of his new Western discuss making the film

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: An obnoxious TV weatherman reporting on a small towns annual festival finds himself caught in a bizarre time loop, and is forced to relive the same day over and over again. While at first he tries to exploit his predicament, he is ultimately driven to mend his ways and adopt a less cynical attitude. Comedy, starring Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott and Stephen Tobolowsky

programme.title: Django Unchained Interview Special
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino and the cast of his new Western discuss making the film

programme.title: Django Unchained
programme.desc: A slave named Django is tracked down by eccentric German bounty hunter Dr King Schultz, who offers him his freedom in exchange for help bringing three criminals to justice. The unlikely allies continue their partnership after the job is done, and fight to rescue Djangos wife from a sadistic plantation owner. Quentin Tarantinos Oscar-winning Western, starring Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Fremont
programme.desc: Struggling to put her life in order, a former US military translator sends out a special message in a cookie at the factory where she works. Drama, starring Anaita Wali Zada, Gregg Turkington and Jeremy Allen White (The Bear)

programme.title: The Actors
programme.desc: A washed-up actor convinces a naive fellow thespian to join him in a scheme to con a big-time gangster - a plan that inevitably leads to trouble, as well as plenty of dressing up. Comedy, starring Michael Caine, Dylan Moran, Michael Gambon and Miranda Richardson

programme.title: The Sound Barrier
programme.desc: An aircraft manufacturer risks alienating his friends and family in a single-minded attempt to prove planes can exceed the speed of sound. David Leans drama, written by Terence Rattigan and starring Ralph Richardson, Ann Todd, Nigel Patrick, Dinah Sheridan and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Against the Wind
programme.desc: A Belgian priest living in exile in Britain during the Second World War becomes a secret agent for the Allies, but his first mission is a disaster, leading to the capture of a resistance leader. Four soldiers are sent into occupied France to rescue the insurgent, but begin to realise they have a traitor in their midst. Thriller, starring Jack Warner and Simone Signoret

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared
programme.desc: The leaders of the tiny European duchy of Grand Fenwick decide to solve their bankruptcy problem by declaring war on the USA. They confidently expect to lose and thereby qualify for economic aid - but the plan takes an unexpected turn for the worse when the Americans surrender. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers in three roles, with Jean Seberg, William Hartnell, David Kossoff and Leo McKern

programme.title: The Fallen Idol
programme.desc: An ambassadors son idolises his fathers butler, and tries to throw the police off his scent when he is suspected of murder. However, the boys actions only make the servant seem more suspicious, and he begins to realise that his hero may have deceived him. Crime drama, starring Ralph Richardson and Bobby Henrey

programme.title: The Personal History of David Copperfield Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Armando Iannucci and actor Dev Patel, who stars in the title role, talk about bringing Charles Dickens beloved novel to the screen

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien arrives on Earth, accompanied by an awesomely powerful robot, on a fateful mission - to decide if the human race deserves to continue - and if not, to wipe it out. The visitor is imprisoned in a military facility, but a scientist helps him escape, hoping to prove that mankind is worth saving. Sci-fi drama remake, starring Keanu Reeves and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: Free Guy
programme.desc: Guy lives a fairly monotonous life as a bank employee. That is until he meets the girl of his dreams and realises hes an NPC within a massive open world video game. Does he deviate from the life hes always lived or does he follow his dream girl into the unknown future? Adventure comedy, starring Ryan Reynolds, Jodie Comer, Taika Waititi and Lil Rel Howery

programme.title: Overlord
programme.desc: In 1944, a group of American soldiers land in an occupied French hamlet after their plane is destroyed by enemy fire. Their mission is to take out a heavily fortified Nazi radio tower hours before D-Day. However, they stumble across a mysterious Nazi lab where their bloodthirsty enemies are waiting for them. Action thriller from producer JJ Abrams, starring Jovan Adepo, Wyatt Russell and Mathilde Ollivier

programme.title: Flag Day
programme.desc: A man lives a double life as a counterfeiter, bank robber and con-man to provide for his daughter. Crime drama based on the true story of Jennifer Vogel. Directed by and starring Sean Penn, with his daughter Dylan playing the role of Jennifer. Also starring Josh Brolin, Regina King and Eddie Marsan

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: Kylie, a struggling pastry chef, discovers she has secured a place in the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition. Spotting a chance to raise her profile - and perhaps jumpstart business at her new cafe - she enters, but her chances of winning are quickly slashed when her oven breaks down right before the contest. Determined to remain in the running, she appeals to her old boyfriend Nick, who gave up his education to take over his family pizzeria. He agrees to let her use his kitchens industrial ovens to craft her gingerbread delicacies, and as they pair work together, a familiar spark rekindles their old flame. Festive romance, starring Lacey Chabert and Lea Coco

programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: I Fought the Law: The Ann Ming Story

programme.desc: New neighbours look set to disturb the tranquillity of Portwenn, upsetting the locals with their unconventional lifestyle and even managing to gatecrash an intimate dinner between Martin and Louisa. Meanwhile, a car vandal strikes the village - but agoraphobic village copper PC Penhale is too scared to leave the station and investigate. Martin Clunes stars

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Ormerod faces a testing time when his father-in-law arrives demanding to know whether he was seeing Dr Weatherill while his late daughter was still alive. Following a heated exchange, it emerges that the disgruntled patriarch has hired a private detective to investigate the couple - but the situation only serves to bring them closer together, culminating in a marriage proposal. At the Royal, a painfully thin girl causes concern for Goodwin - whose green-eyed monster emerges when student nurse Samantha Beaumont agrees to a date with a younger man - and the hospital is evacuated after a suicide victims corpse is brought in emitting toxic fumes. Medical drama, starring Robert Daws, Amy Robbins, Paul Fox and Anna Madeley

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A mystery visitor surprises Greengrass with the unusual and rather handy talent of dreaming the names of winning horses, while Maggies ethics are called into question when she turns out to be the main beneficiary in a recently deceased patients will

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Lord Ashfordly antagonises local ramblers by closing off a public footpath across his land, while Greengrass appoints himself Aidensfields new chimney-sweep _ but displays his usual reluctance to actually do any work, convinced he can make far more money by conning soon-to-be-married couples into hiring him as a `lucky" wedding guest. Rural drama, starring Bill Maynard and Rupert Vansittart

programme.desc: Kelly loses a modelling job and slaps Carrie when she says its punishment for the abortion. Barraclough turns to Carl for comfort, while Pearl and Jamie attend their interviews.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: The irascible medic and Louisa embark on what seems to be a perfect first date at a classical music performance in the grounds of a country house, but an inappropriate remark from the doctor kills off any chance of romance. Elsewhere, Al worries that Paulines gambling is getting out of hand when he finds out that her moped has been repossessed. Comedy drama, starring Martin Clunes and Caroline Catz

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: The Aidensfield bobbies investigate a series of arson attacks, but have trouble finding the evidence to convict their chief suspects _ until a further blaze claims a victim. Guest starring Ralf Little and Coronation Streets Alan Halsall (Tyrone Dobbs)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: An eccentric elderly lady reports an abduction, presenting the Aidensfield coppers with a fresh mystery to solve, while Greengrass has dealings with an old crony who wants him to enter a champion ferret in a race. Rural drama, starring Bill Maynard, Derek Fowlds and Margery Mason

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: A fishermans body is found tangled up in a North Sea trawlers net. Vera and her team investigate with the help of the local harbourmaster, and find the dead mans sons pointing the finger at the owner of a fish market, with whom they have a long-running feud. Retracing the dead mans steps, Vera discovers when he drowned and tracks down a waitress who may have been one of the last people to see him alive. However, the case becomes more complicated when a witness runs away and a boat belonging to the dead mans sister-in-law goes up in flames

However, a vow of silence between the defendants means Jake and Alesha face one of their toughest court battles yet

programme.title: Law and Order: UK
programme.desc: The team tries to juggle three cases over the course of one day, beginning at 6am when Brooks and Casey are called to a crime scene where a barman has been shot dead in his car. Bradley Walsh and Paul Nicholls star

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A land dispute escalates during a cowboy fair run by the Wild West Society in the village of Ford Florey. Farmers Jack Fincher and Silas Burbage both claim to own a patch of wasteland known as the Swamp, but Dan Malko wants to buy it and create a travellers site. Barnaby and Jones are called in when the feud leads to murder during the Wild West-style shoot-outs at the annual event. Guest starring Kenneth Cranham, with John Nettles and Jason Hughes

programme.desc: A police lab technician is stabbed to death in her home and while Brooks and Casey pursue their lead suspect, another woman is attacked in an identical fashion. Guest starring Lydia Leonard, with Bradley Walsh and Paul Nicholls

Starring Bradley Walsh, Dominic Rowan and Paul Nicholls

Donatello (voiced by Micah Abbey), Leonardo (Nicolas Cantu), Michelangelo (Shamon Brown Jr) and Raphael (Brady Noon) experience the usual growing pains of teenagers while contending with the media spotlight. Building on their friendship with aspiring reporter April ONeil (Ayo Edebiri), the reptilian quartet face brilliant inventor Bishop (Alanna Ubach), who believes mutants are the greatest danger facing humankind and must be eliminated. Meanwhile, pampered rich kid Rod (Pete Davison) yearns to be a mutant and leverages his wealth and connections to achieve a dangerous dream

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: The wise-cracking blue hedgehog, made famous by a series of popular video games on Sega consoles, continues his computer-animated adventures through the Shatterverse. At the end of the first series, the eponymous spiny mammal (voiced by Deven Mack) learnt from black hedgehog Shadow (Ian Hanlin) that the original version of Green Hill no longer exists. Sonic is trapped in a multiverse of mayhem with different iterations of his friends Amy Rose (Shannon Chan-Kent), Knuckles (Adam Nurada), Rouge (Kazumi Evans) and Tails (Ashleigh Ball). Sonic and Shadow must put aside their differences and work together to repair the temporal damage and outwit diabolical scientist Dr Eggman (Brian Drummond)
